section.title: DTO Import Format
section.para: The DTO import package should contain the following files.

section.title: people.csv
section.para: A table which contains information about the people in each house.

formalpara.title: SQL
ventilationsystem
formalpara.para: one of natural, mechanicalpositiveinputfromoutside, mechanicalpositiveinputfromloft, mechanicalwholehouseextract, mechanicalbalancedwholehousewithoutheatrecovery, mechanicalbalancedwholehousewithheatrecovery

formalpara.title: SQL
formalpara.programlisting: CREATE TYPE VentilationSystem AS ENUM ('natural', 'mechanicalpositiveinputfromoutside', 'mechanicalpositiveinputfromloft', 'mechanicalwholehouseextract', 'mechanicalbalancedwholehousewithoutheatrecovery', 'mechanicalbalancedwholehousewithheatrecovery'); CREATE TABLE ventilation ( "aacode" varchar(100), "chimneysmainheating" int, "chimneysother" int, "chimneyssecondaryheating" int, "intermittentfans" int, "passivevents" int, "ventilationsystem" VentilationSystem, "windowsanddoorsdraughtstrippedproportion" double precision );

section.title: warnings.csv
section.para: This file is used to add log messages that will be held against the imported Survey Case, these will be in addition to any generated during the import from DTO to Survey Case in either the import or imputation phases. This file may be left with just column titles if no log entries need to be added to the Survey Case.

formalpara.title: electrictariff
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of flat_rate, economy_7, economy_10, twentyfour_hour_heating

formalpara.title: fluetype
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of chimney, openflue( or open_flue), balancedflue( or balanced_flue), fanassistedbalancedflue( or fan_assisted_balanced_flue), notapplicable( or not_applicable)

formalpara.title: immersionheatertype
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of single_coil, dual_coil

formalpara.title: mainheatingfuel
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of mains_gas, bulk_lpg, bottled_lpg, electricity, oil, biomass_pellets, biomass_woodchip, biomass_wood, photons, house_coal, community_heat, peak_electricity, off_peak_electricity, exported_electricity

formalpara.title: waterheatingsystemtype
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of standard_boiler, air_source_heat_pump, ground_source_heat_pump, singlepoint, multipoint, warm_air, community_chp, community, back_boiler

formalpara.title: SQL
formalpara.programlisting: CREATE TABLE water-heating ( "aacode" varchar(100), "basicefficiency" double precision, "chpfraction" double precision, "communitychargingusagebased" boolean, "electrictariff" ElectricityTariffType, "fluetype" FlueType, "summerefficiency" double precision, "winterefficiency" double precision, "cylinderfactoryinsulated" boolean, "cylinderinsulationthickness" double precision, "cylinderthermostatpresent" boolean, "cylindervolume" double precision, "immersionheatertype" ImmersionHeaterType, "installationyear" int, "mainheatingfuel" FuelType, "solarhotwaterpresent" boolean, "solarstoreincylinder" boolean, "solarstorevolume" double precision, "waterheatingsystemtype" WaterHeatingSystemType, "withcentralheating" boolean );

section.title: elevations.csv
section.para: Used to define each dimension for a house case, it's expected that each house case would have 4 dimensions (FRONT, BACK, LEFT, and RIGHT).

formalpara.title: doubleglazedwindowframe
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of wood, metal, upvc. Default is null

formalpara.title: elevationtype
formalpara.para: one of front, back, left, right

formalpara.title: externalwallconstructiontype
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of internal_plasterboardontimberframe, internal_denseblockdenseplaster, internal_denseblockplasterboardondabs, party_denseplasterbothsidesdenseblockscavity, party_singleplasterboardbothsidesdenseblockscavity, party_singleplasterboardbothsidesdensecellularblockscavity, party_singleplasterboardbothsidesdenseaacblockscavity, party_doubleplasterbothsidestwintimberframe, party_metalframe, graniteorwhinstone, sandstone, solidbrick, cob, cavity, timberframe, systembuild, metalframe

formalpara.title: singleglazedwindowframe
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of wood, metal, upvc

formalpara.title: SQL
formalpara.programlisting: CREATE TYPE ElevationType AS ENUM ('front', 'back', 'left', 'right'); CREATE TABLE elevations ( "aacode" varchar(100), "cavitywallinsulation" boolean, "doorframe:wood,doortype:solid" int, "doorframe:wood,doortype:glazed" int, "doorframe:metal,doortype:solid" int, "doorframe:metal,doortype:glazed" int, "doorframe:upvc,doortype:solid" int, "doorframe:upvc,doortype:glazed" int, "doubleglazedwindowframe" FrameType, "elevationtype" ElevationType, "externalwallinsulation" boolean, "externalwallconstructiontype" WallConstructionType, "internalinsulation" boolean, "percentagedoubleglazed" double precision, "singleglazedwindowframe" FrameType, "tenthsattached" double precision, "tenthsopening" double precision, "tenthspartywall" double precision );

section.title: cases.csv
section.para: This data file holds what we consider headline information for a survey case, this file needs to present for in every import package as it is the first one processed by the system and thus provides the dictionary of all house cases and AACODES (Unique reference) which should be imported into the housing stock.

formalpara.title: builtformtype
formalpara.para: one of endterrace, midterrace, semidetached, detached, bungalow, convertedflat, purposebuiltlowriseflat, purposebuilthighriseflat

formalpara.title: morphologytype
formalpara.para: one of hamletsandisolateddwellings, village, townandfringe, urban

formalpara.title: regiontype
formalpara.para: one of westernscotland, easternscotland, northeast, yorkshireandhumber, northwest, eastmidlands, westmidlands, southwest, eastofengland, southeast, london, northernscotland, wales, northernireland

formalpara.title: tenuretype
formalpara.para: one of owneroccupied, privaterented, housingassociation, localauthority

formalpara.title: SQL
formalpara.programlisting: CREATE TYPE BuiltFormType AS ENUM ('endterrace', 'midterrace', 'semidetached', 'detached', 'bungalow', 'convertedflat', 'purposebuiltlowriseflat', 'purposebuilthighriseflat'); CREATE TYPE FloorConstructionType AS ENUM ('solid', 'suspendedtimber'); CREATE TYPE MorphologyType AS ENUM ('hamletsandisolateddwellings', 'village', 'townandfringe', 'urban'); CREATE TYPE RegionType AS ENUM ('westernscotland', 'easternscotland', 'northeast', 'yorkshireandhumber', 'northwest', 'eastmidlands', 'westmidlands', 'southwest', 'eastofengland', 'southeast', 'london', 'northernscotland', 'wales', 'northernireland'); CREATE TYPE TenureType AS ENUM ('owneroccupied', 'privaterented', 'housingassociation', 'localauthority'); CREATE TABLE cases ( "aacode" varchar(100), "adults" int, "backplotdepth" double precision, "backplotwidth" double precision, "buildyear" int, "builtformtype" BuiltFormType, "children" int, "dwellingcaseweight" double precision, "grndfloortype" FloorConstructionType, "frontplotdepth" double precision, "frontplotwidth" double precision, "hasaccesstooutsidespace" boolean, "hasdraftlobby" boolean, "hasloft" boolean, "householdcaseweight" double precision, "livingareafaction" double precision, "mainfloorlevel" int, "morphologytype" MorphologyType, "numofhabitalrooms" int, "numofbedrooms" int, "ongasgrid" boolean, "partlyownsroof" boolean, "regiontype" RegionType, "tenuretype" TenureType );

formalpara.title: coveringtype
formalpara.para: one of tile, slates, thatch, asphalt, metal, felt

formalpara.title: insulationthickness
formalpara.para: empty, null, or a decimal. Default is null

formalpara.title: structuretype
formalpara.para: one of pitched, flat, mandard, chalet

formalpara.title: SQL

section.title: storeys.csv
section.para: Used to construct a storey for a Survey Case, a house can have one or more stories, no validation is currently implemented but it's assumed that there would be only one BASEMENT, GROUND, FIRST, SECOND, TOP and ROOM IN ROOF, there may be more than one HIGHER_FLOOR. The shape of a floor is determined by the floor polygon x, y and number of points, these are used to construct a polygon for the floor. Area is then determined using the polygon. It's important to note that as of version 2.0, length, width and area are not longer utilised within the stock import.

formalpara.title: type
formalpara.para: one of basement, ground, first_floor, second_floor, higher_floor, top_floor, room_in_roof

formalpara.title: polygonxpoints
formalpara.para: A comma-separated list of numbers, enclosed in braces (x-coordinates). Default is {}

formalpara.title: polygonypoints
formalpara.para: A comma-separated list of numbers, enclosed in braces (y-coordinates). Default is {}

formalpara.title: polypoints
formalpara.para: An integer (number of coordinates). Default is 0

formalpara.title: SQL
formalpara.programlisting: CREATE TYPE FloorLocationType AS ENUM ('basement', 'ground', 'first_floor', 'second_floor', 'higher_floor', 'top_floor', 'room_in_roof'); CREATE TABLE storeys ( "aacode" varchar(100), "ceilingheight" double precision, "type" FloorLocationType, "polygonxpoints" varchar(100), "polygonypoints" varchar(100), "polypoints" integer NOT NULL, "storyheight" double precision );

formalpara.title: electrictariff
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of flat_rate, economy_7, economy_10, twentyfour_hour_heating

formalpara.title: fluetype
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of chimney, openflue( or open_flue), balancedflue( or balanced_flue), fanassistedbalancedflue( or fan_assisted_balanced_flue), notapplicable( or not_applicable)

formalpara.title: heatingsystemcontroltypes
formalpara.para: A ';'-separated sequence of one of programmer, roomthermostat( or room_thermostat), thermostaticradiatorvalve( or thermostatic_radiator_valve), timetemperaturezonecontrol( or time_temperature_zone_control), appliancethermostat( or appliance_thermostat), bypass, flowswitch( or flow_switch), boilerenergymanager( or boiler_energy_manager), boilerinterlock( or boiler_interlock), delayedstartthermostat( or delayed_start_thermostat)

formalpara.title: mainheatingfuel
formalpara.para: one of mains_gas, bulk_lpg, bottled_lpg, electricity, oil, biomass_pellets, biomass_woodchip, biomass_wood, photons, house_coal, community_heat, peak_electricity, off_peak_electricity, exported_electricity

formalpara.title: secondaryheatingsystemtype
formalpara.para: one of no_secondary_system, not_known, lpg_heater, gas_fire, gas_fire_flueless, gas_fire_open_flue, gas_coal_effect_fire, electric_room_heaters, open_fire

formalpara.title: spaceheatingsystemtype
formalpara.para: one of standard, combi, cpsu, storage_combi, back_boiler, back_boiler_no_central_heating, storage_heater, room_heater, warm_air, community_heating_without_chp, community_heating_with_chp, ground_source_heat_pump, air_source_heat_pump, missing

formalpara.title: storageheatercontroltype
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of manualchargecontrol( or manual_charge_control), automaticchargecontrol( or automatic_charge_control), celectchargecontrol( or celect_charge_control)

formalpara.title: storageheatertype
formalpara.para: empty, null, or one of oldlargevolume( or old_large_volume), slimline, convector, fan, integrateddirectacting( or integrated_direct_acting)

formalpara.title: SQL
formalpara.programlisting: CREATE TYPE FuelType AS ENUM ('mains_gas', 'bulk_lpg', 'bottled_lpg', 'electricity', 'oil', 'biomass_pellets', 'biomass_woodchip', 'biomass_wood', 'photons', 'house_coal', 'community_heat', 'peak_electricity', 'off_peak_electricity', 'exported_electricity'); CREATE TYPE SecondaryHeatingSystemType AS ENUM ('no_secondary_system', 'not_known', 'lpg_heater', 'gas_fire', 'gas_fire_flueless', 'gas_fire_open_flue', 'gas_coal_effect_fire', 'electric_room_heaters', 'open_fire'); CREATE TYPE SpaceHeatingSystemType AS ENUM ('standard', 'combi', 'cpsu', 'storage_combi', 'back_boiler', 'back_boiler_no_central_heating', 'storage_heater', 'room_heater', 'warm_air', 'community_heating_without_chp', 'community_heating_with_chp', 'ground_source_heat_pump', 'air_source_heat_pump', 'missing'); CREATE TABLE space-heating ( "aacode" varchar(100), "basicefficiency" double precision, "chpfraction" double precision, "communitychargingusagebased" boolean, "electrictariff" ElectricityTariffType, "fluetype" FlueType, "summerefficiency" double precision, "winterefficiency" double precision, "iscondensing" boolean, "heatingsystemcontroltypes" HeatingSystemControlType[], "installationyear" int, "mainheatingfuel" FuelType, "secondaryheatingsystemtype" SecondaryHeatingSystemType, "spaceheatingsystemtype" SpaceHeatingSystemType, "isstoragecombicylinderfactoryinsulated" boolean, "storagecombicylinderinsulationthickness" double precision, "isstoragecombicylinderthemostatpresent" boolean, "storagecombicylindervolume" double precision, "storagecombisolarvolume" double precision, "storageheatercontroltype" StorageHeaterControlType, "storageheatertype" StorageHeaterType );

formalpara.title: SQL
datemovedin
formalpara.para: empty, null, or A UNIX timestamp (integer milliseconds since the epoch)

formalpara.title: SQL
formalpara.programlisting: CREATE TABLE occupants ( "aacode" varchar(100), "chiefincomeearnersage" int, "datemovedin" bigint, "hasdisabledorsickoccupant" boolean, "hasoccupantonbenefits" boolean, "householdincomebeforetax" double precision, "workinghours" varchar(100) );
